media.caption: Aaron started his career as a music student. As he grasped more to the business he realized all life is a harmony of connections.

text.headline: Aaron Aviles
text.text: In his early career Aaron created background music for workout programs as well as the very first sound effects that generated by computers.

media.caption: Another amazing day by the ocean, it never gets old in the West Side.

text.headline: Where it all Begin
text.text: It all started as a young entrepreneur had the idea of marketing his brain. This idea was fresh and needed some brainstorming sessions to cool down and get ready for the final countdown.

text.headline: First Meeting
text.text: At the age of 30 Aaron had accomplished many; needed a crew to establish a network to spread the word. Aaron is the new King of the West side.

text.headline: Exploring the sky with a Drone
text.text: I love to expand the limits of technology. I love my house as well, with drones it is easier to market your AirBNB houses to earn more!

media.caption: Fire is the mirror of the Soul...

text.headline: Outdoors exploring inner peace.
text.text: It is the most beautiful when we are allowed to experience the same event from different perspectives. That's why there are multiple camera's everywhere. It is a magnificent opportunity to live in an advanced technological era.

media.caption: Sports at its finest, here at Vegas

text.headline: It was an amazing experience at CG Technology Event.
text.text: It was an honor to be a part of Huskies at Las Vegas.
